title: Full Stack Engineer
description: Worked on a CRM for Real Estate agents, specifically on the module responsible for the new construction in the Netherlands.
Contributed to the migration of the module from scratch to newer technologies.
Joined the Security Chapter of the company.
Worked within an Agile scrum team, contributing to 100% continuous improvement and deployment (CICD).

title: Full Stack Engineer
description: Implemented several new features in a set of different applications for the biggest company responsible for the payments sector in Portugal.
Integrated a new authorization server for the company, migrating and adapting the old one to Keycloak.
Migrated and built from scratch multiple frontend applications from old technologies to newer ones.

title: Software Engineer
description: Designed, estimated and implemented new features for an application used in the client's management for one of the biggest companies in the telecommunications and media sector in Portugal.
Collaborated everyday with multiple teams responsible for other parts of the application.
Presented all the implemented features to the client.
Created and continuously tested the application through integration tests.

title: Software Engineer
description: Worked individually on designing an orchestrator to automate the software installation process when requested by internal teams, eliminating the need for humans to process validations and perform tasks.
Implemented and documented the whole database architecture together with all the scripts needed to communicate between third party APIs and install software in the users machines.

title: Software Engineer
description: Joined a team responsible for the billing sector in a Customer Care & Billing application for the biggest energy company based in Portugal.
Resolved multiple issues reported by the client through a SLA contract.
Implemented new software enhancements in the application.
